lyric:
[ti:GOLD]
[ar:Happiness]
[al:GOLD]
[by:菜籽酱]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Ava1anche / Andy Love
[00:01.00] 作词 : Kanata Okajima
[00:12.93]
[00:19.80]意外で 未知で
[00:21.95]気づいたら U like a dynamo
[00:23.94]きっともう ほっとけない
[00:26.13](何故だか You feel so right)
[00:28.45]さりげなく Hidden diamond
[00:30.50]ぶつかるココロ Firework
[00:32.84]この恋 眠れない
[00:34.69](不思議と Feel so alive)
[00:36.28]
[00:36.68]Hey a
[00:38.91]いつの間にか We going higher?
[00:40.85]Hey a
[00:43.02]サラケダシテ Red hot desire
[00:45.18]Hey a
[00:47.28]触れ合う度に Starting a fire, a fire
[00:51.18]この恋は Like touching the sun
[00:52.95]
[00:53.30]確実に Crush on you
[00:55.01]強烈に Hyped on you
[00:57.18]U make me feel like Gold, Gold

[01:10.64]
[01:11.00]G.O.L.D

[01:49.89]それでも Won't stop till it's light
[01:51.79](不思議と Feel so alive)

[01:53.80]Hey a

[02:34.67]

[02:44.99]

[02:46.00]Make me glow
[02:47.04]ココロとカラダ Gold
[02:49.27]夢見てるの？ Floating so high
